stories.title: Goldfish can learn to navigate a small robotic vehicle on land

stories.text:
It's annual review season now / soon for many companies, and one thing I always struggle with is remembering what I did over the past year. How does everyone (does anyone?) keep track of things over the course of the year to make sure they do well during review season?

If you are a people manager, is there anything you do to help your directs do well? Help them save successes / failures?

(A related question I have is "how does anyone remember answers to behavioral questions that start with `tell me about a time when . . . `?)
stories.title: Ask HN: It's annual review season, how do you remember what you did last year?
